// -------------------- R-Type Test --------------------
110000001000111000 //add - tests ALU functions using registers 2 and 3, saving data to register 8
110001001000111000 //addu
110010001000111000 //sub
110011001000111000 //subu
110100001000111000 //and
110101001000111000 //or
110110001000111000 //xor
110111001000111000 //nor
111010001000111000 //slt
111011001000111000 //sltu
101100001000111000 //mult - multi functions
101000001000111000 //mfhi
101010001000111000 //mflo
101110001000111000 //div
101000001000111000 //mfhi
101010001000111000 //mflo
100100001000111000 //sllv - shift functions
100101001000111000 //srlv
100111001000111000 //srav
